data.name: Leveling Up: How Brands Connect With Gaming Audiences Matters More Than Ever
data.summary:
Attend this session and learn:

How the Gaming audience uses Social Media to engage with their fans and other audiences.

What types of content resonate most with the Gaming audience?

How to turn gamer insights into an actionable strategy that delivers results.

Global Head of Gaming Content Partnerships
